Text: love this song man how can you hope the new album will be better, this is an  advanced mix too they have a different producer mixing the whole album + this song for the release
I wasn't impressed with it but it's growing on me :P

Hey ToolGod, relax. Encase you haven't noticed, this isn't a finished copy of the song. You can tell it's really rough around the edges, sounds like shit at high volumes and the vocals TOTALLY haven't been mastered.
Sorry ToolGod, re-read my comment. I sounded rude. I just meant have faith in Machine Head. They will impress.

No sorry needed :)) It's one of the final copies, there is this version and another on the Album apparently .. Not so much a demo just one is mixed by someone else - I think, can't confirm though it's just what I read :))
I think it's their best work yet!
Please buy the album "Unto the Locust" if you want Machine Head to keep making music. They stay true to their fans!!! support them!!!
